title: Addhuri Kannada DVDRip 2012 ~BindassBro's~
description:
--------------Addhuri Kannada DVDRip 2012 ~BindassBro's~ with Subtitle~---------
          ----------------- BindassBro Release ----------------------



ABOUT THE MOVIE:

Addhuri is a 2012 Kannada romantic film starring Dhruva Sarja, who is making his film debut and Radhika Pandit in the lead roles. The story, screenplay, 
dialogues and direction are by A. P. Arjun of the Kannada movie Ambaari fame. V. Harikrishna is the music director of the film. Keerthi Swamy of Maryland, U S A and Shankar Reddy of Bengaluru have produced the venture. Soorya S Kiran of "Dildaara" fame is the Cinematographer. The film made its theatrical release across Karnataka screens on 15 June 2012.The stunts are handled by Ravi Verma. In one of the scenes Dhruva Sarja jumped from 65 feet height and done all stunts without dupes
